x_qune_da_error_code.remediation:
Troubleshooting steps should be followed in the order given below. 1. Verify if the Device Credentials are configured correctly and work with ServiceNow Team to confirm that they are configured correctly in ServiceNow. 2. Verify that the credentials have access rights to the Servers. The credentials should have Root privileges or preferably have the right to execute commands with Root Privileges using sudo.
(Ignore error if this is a Network Device or ESXi devices, as these devices are classified and populated by SNMP Discovery for Network Devices and vCenter Discovery for ESXi Devices.)
x_qune_da_error_code.root_cause: SSH Credentials are not present or incorrect. Ignore if this is an SNMP Device (which is also responding to SSH Protocol as they are populated via SNMP Discovery). Ignore if this is an ESXi Host (which is also responding to SSH Protocol as they are populated via vCenter Discovery).
